column3: PAO transcript begins - Maroon Team (Windler) on shift
Burnt smell in the LM tunnel
Vance Brand takes over as CapCom
Joe Kerwin takes over as CapCom
Questions about the Saturn V booster
News update about the Beatles and golf
Lovell compares Apollo 13 launch to Apollo 8
Kerwin talks about the engine shutdown
Vance Brand takes over as CapCom
Teasing Brand about Charlie Duke mistaking the Earth for the Moon on TV
Jack Swigert - hello to 'all the girls'
Brand talks about fuel cell temperatures
Go to start observing Comet Bennett
Crew gives up trying to spot Comet Bennett
Haise questions Brand about Mattingly's possible illness
Swigert writes down changes to the CMP Solo Book
Ken Mattingly - CMP Solo Book with Swigert
Brand teases Swigert about Big Brother watching
PAD for lunar flyby in case of no lunar orbit insertion is read
Swigert and Brand discuss whether course correction is needed
Discussing the Supercritical helium pressure in the Lunar Module
Crew starts to get ready to sleep
Jack Lousma takes over as CapCom
Lousma and Lovell tease each other over CapCom duties
PAO announces Joe Kerwin taking over as CapCom
We're bored to tears down here
Music "With Their Eyes on the Stars"
Consumables report and discussing O2 tank 2 quantity sensor failure
Discussing a pressure problem in the hydrogen tank
Kerwin and crew discusses changes to the flight plan
Kerwin and Swigert discuss a minor problem with Command Module optics
Kerwin instructs on how to observe Comet Bennett
Kerwin and Swigert talk about the cryo tank problems
Kerwin and Haise talk about the LM helium tank
PAO notes Ken Mattingly is in Mission Control
Kerwin orders the crew to stir the cryo tanks more frequently
Vance Brand has taken over as CapCom
Brand and Lovell tease each other
Jack Lousma has taken over as CapCom
Haise has a problem with LM displays
Problems with the High Gain Antenna
Haise talks about LEVA and CDR stripes
Haise scares Lovell with the repress valve
An Explosion on board disables the spacecraft
Lovell says he can see gas leaking into space
Swigert having trouble controlling the ship
Trying to raise pressure in O2 tank 1
Starting a survey of onboard displays
Close reactant valves on fuel cell 3
Kranz accidentally on the comm loop. Lunney takes over
Close reactant valves on fuel cell 1
Swigert reports O2 tank pressure is falling
Lousma reads procedure to turn on LM power
Lousma orders the crew to move into the LM
Didn't think I'd be back in this soon.
Haise and Lovell program LM computer
Swigert reports CM computer and IMU off
Lovell reports Odyssey fully powered down
LM Ascent Oxygen tank pressure issue discussed
Lousma reads up first PAD for PC+2 burn
Crew's tense language prompts Lousma to suggest radio is on hot mike
Haise asks for home return time
Lovell reports they can't see stars due to debris
Lousma talks of plan for first course adjustment
Haise and Lousma start going over burn checklist
Lousma reads up PAD for the course correction
Lousma teases Haise about the situation being a training simulation
GO for the course correction burn
Joe Kerwin takes over as CapCom
Trying to reconfigure the radio to low power
Change of shift press conference (audio only)
Lovell speculates on "last lunar mission for a long time."
Charlie Duke comes on line to talk about operations
Haise and Duke joke about Duke's measles
Haise inquires after Neil and Buzz
Vance Brand takes over as CapCom
Lovell concerned about the Sun check
Polar View and Spacecraft View of Apollo 13 trajectory (animation)
Brand gives a PC+2 PAD update
Change of shift press conference (audio only)
Review of mission rules for PC+2 burn
Lovell talks about importance of a speedy return
Apollo 13 goes behind the Moon and loses radio contact
Final updates for the PC+2 burn read by Brand
Brand reports S-IVB impact with the Moon
Brand tells of plans to build a CO2 adapter
Lovell talks about food and water
Swigert jokes about commanding the LM
Lovell and Swigert power down LM computer
Lousma gives the crew an update on mission plans
Lousma talks about the CO2 adapter
Lousma and Haise joke with one another
Lousma jokes about the last TV show
Haise asks about the S-IVB impact results
Lousma briefs Lovell on attitude control using the Earth as reference
Lousma reads up manual midcourse instructions PAD
Lovell and Lousma joke about the LRL quarantine
Joe Kerwin takes over as CapCom
Kerwin starts to talk the crew through CO2 adapter build
Tom Stafford speaks to the crew
Swigert and Kerwin start to configure the Command Module
Deke Slayton jokes with the crew
Change of shift press conference (audio only)
Crew plugs in the CO2 adapter
Kerwin and Swigert talk about CM power system
Fred talks about training for Apollo 8 backup crew
Kerwin reads up a procedure for transferring LM power to CM
Kerwin and Haise joke about doing an EVA
Kerwin reports A13 now at Earth's sphere of influence
Haise jokes with Brand about food
Change of shift press conference (audio only)
Duke comes on line to talk about procedures
Brand starts to read up CM power-up procedure
Deke Slayton questions about crew comfort
Lousma takes over as CapCom. Manual burn PAD read
Lovell comments on the manual burn procedure
Long PAO update on the situation
Change of shift press conference (media unavailable)
Lovell and Lousma tease each other
Lovell banters to Lousma about sleeping arrangements in the LM
Lovell and Lousma talk about home
Lousma and Swigert talk about recharging CM batteries
Swigert and Lousma tease each other
Haise and Lousma banter about LM's record endurance
Change of shift press conference (audio only)
Swigert and Kerwin talk about the CO2 adapter
Swigert makes bathroom jokes to Kerwin
Advance warning on LM water tank running low
Lovell jokes about wearing lunar boots for warmth
Kerwin questions about crew feeling cold
Lovell wants to know about the reentry procedure
Crossing mid-point between Earth and the Moon
Change of shift press conference (audio only)
Onboard film of interior of the spacecraft
Brand reads up a stowage list
Crew confesses to having removed their bio sensors
Swigert talks about not having moon rock boxes
Haise and Brand joke about the CM being so cold it's snowing
Swigert asks whether John Aaron is on duty
Lovell asks Brand about Ken's measles
Lovell reports they've run out of drinking water
Brand stalls the crew about the reentry checklist
Lovell demands time for the crew to learn the new checklist
Ken Mattingly takes over the comm for checklist reading
Change of shift press conference (audio only)
Lovell jokes with Mattingly and Slayton
Slayton tells Haise and Lovell to sleep
Lovell woken up by radio chatter
Lovell demands a stop to checklist changes
Swigert tells itâ€™s too cold to sleep
Slayton suggests the crew take stimulants for landing
Lousma tells the crew to start activating LM
Lovell and Lousma joke about Earth getting bigger
Lovell still looking for Fra Mauro
Kerwin takes over as CapCom, course correction PAD
Swigert starts to power up Odyssey
Haise reports on the last course correction
PAO lists guest present in Mission Control
Lovell is last to leave Aquarius
Apollo 13 crew arrives on Iwo Jima
Mission plaque hung in mission control
Crew phone call with the president

Non-realtime: Assembly of Apollo 13's Saturn V
